message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with recommender systems, which are typically studied in the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The use of textual descriptions and metadata to predict latent embeddings of items suggests a natural connection to Natural Language Processing (cs.CL) and Computer Vision (cs.CV) sub-categories. Finally, the incorporation of metadata and tags to improve accuracy suggests a connection to Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category.
